description: ff. 27. 195 x 130; 150 x 100 mm. 21 lin. 18th/19th cen. Abridgment of his al-Wasīlah fī al-taḥṣīn wa-al-aʻmāl al-qalīlah: Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 1009 (125). Incip.: ... الحمد لله والصلوة ... اما بعد فلما کان الشهر المحمدى شعبان من سنة ستىن
author: Fākihī, Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn Abd al-Qādir
title: Khulāṣat al-taḥṣīn wa-al-wasīlah ilá ʻaẓīm thawāb al-aʻmāl al-qalīlah
creator: Fākihī, Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn Abd al-Qādir
subject: Islamic ethics—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
